item.title: Major glitch... help!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok whenever some1 uses an invalid name like

“bob_!@#”
or "bob "

it makes it a null instead of disconnecting -.-

heres a picture

and when it makes a null it makes that ip unable 2 connect til the next restart…

how i make it so it actualy disconnects that person?

EDIT:
heres the code 4 wats causing it…

if (!playerName.matches("[A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*[A-Za-z0-9]+") || playerName.matches("[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*(__|_ | _| )+[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*")) { System.out.println("Bad Username: Failed for '"+playerName+"'"); returnCode = 4; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); logout(); return; }

HELP APRECIATED
